title: Samsung sponsors annual science education program for students (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) Aiming to improve science education and help spread scientific knowledge in China , Samsung Electronics has sponsored a project called Solve for Tomorrow every year since 2013, using its experience and
